meaningMnemonic: With the 日 of 日本, the 日 means <kanji>Japan</kanji>. Then, you add <kanji>Korea</kanji> into the mix and you have Japan + Korea. This word means <vocabulary>Japan and South Korea</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>Japan and Korea</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
